definition: dish (type of food)/vegetable/cuisine/CL:盤|盘[pan2],道[dao4]/(coll.) (one's) type/(of one's skills etc) weak/poor

sentences.english: The invention discloses a method for detoxicating rapeseed cakes or rapeseed dregs.
sentences.chinese: 本发明公开了一种菜籽饼或菜籽粕的脱毒方法。

sentences.english: The invention discloses a method for detoxicating rapeseed cakes or rapeseed dregs.
sentences.chinese: 本发明公开了一种菜籽饼或菜籽粕的脱毒方法。

sentences.english: Experiment of culturing Tricholoma giganteum by using rapeseed coat as culture material was carried out.
sentences.chinese: 用菜籽皮作培养料进行了巨大口蘑的栽培对比试验。

sentences.english: At present, erucic acid is mainly produced from high erucic acid rapeseed oil.
sentences.chinese: 目前芥酸主要从高芥酸菜籽油中制取。

sentences.english: The standardized ileal digestibility of amino acids in domestic double-low rapeseed meal was lower.
sentences.chinese: 国产双低菜籽粕的氨基酸标准回肠末端消化率较低。

sentences.english: We want to buy Seafood, Sheepskins, Rapeseed, Edible Oils, Wheats , Gold Bullion.
sentences.chinese: 我们要采购海鲜，羊皮，油菜籽，食品油，小麦。

sentences.english: Don't mix up the two kinds of vegetable seeds.
sentences.chinese: 别把这两种菜籽搀杂在一起。

sentences.english: The antioxidation and mechanism of polyphenol from rapeseed(RSPP) were studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了菜籽多酚的抗氧化作用与机理。

sentences.english: Biodiosel was prepared from rapeseed oil with methanol catalyzed by heterogeneous catalyst.
sentences.chinese: 以菜籽油为原料，以非均相催化剂催化制备生物柴油。

sentences.english: In addition, the property and refining method of cold pressing rapeseed oil were studied.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究的是未脱皮油菜籽直接冷榨工艺。

sentences.english: A reliable method to separate and identify glucosinolates in rapeseed has been reported.
sentences.chinese: 报道了一个分离鉴定油菜籽中硫苷组分的有效方法。

sentences.english: Mustard oil can be extracted from the seeds.
sentences.chinese: 可从芥菜籽中提炼出芥末油。

sentences.english: The essential oil from Rabdosia nervosa seeds was extracted by steam distillation.
sentences.chinese: 水蒸汽蒸馏法从显脉香茶菜籽中提取挥发油。

sentences.english: The seed of the rape plant.
sentences.chinese: 那部机器从油菜籽榨出油。

sentences.english: Ren Jinxiang is waiting until September to seed rape on her field.
sentences.chinese: 任金祥等待着九月份在田地上播种油菜籽苗。

definition: to extract oil from vegetables/to press
variant of 包穀|包谷[bao1 gu3]
